template.name: gnome_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the gnome module.

desc.p: This template creates a derived domain which is used for gconf sessions.
This template is invoked automatically for each role, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

param.name: user_role
param.summary: The role associated with the user domain.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

template.name: gnome_domtrans_user_gconf
template.summary: Run gconfd in the role-specific gconfd domain.

desc.p: Run gconfd in the role-specfic gconfd domain.
This is a templated interface, and should only be called from a per-userdomain template.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.
